Introduction: \nEvery aim seems impossible without concentration and technique. No matter how many obstacles come your way, overcoming them would be easier if we choose the right direction so come put all your focus and skills together to help the coin reach its destination.
\nDescription: \nThe participants will have to drop the given coin in such a way that the coin faces within the circumference of the ring placed at the bottom of a vessel full of water by your own capability without getting in touch with water.
\nRules: \n1) Maximum 3 attempts will be given to the participant.
2) Decision made by the coordinated will be treated as final.
3) You cannot touch the vessel and so with water.
4) No obstruction should be caused to the setup made for the event.
5) The participants will be disqualified if any of the above rules are violated.
